::: {.project-card}
<div class="project-title">Latent Representation and Tiered Indexing for Scalable and Efficient Data Product Creation from Large Data Lakes</div>

This project focuses on developing advanced techniques for creating scalable and efficient data products from large data lakes through latent representation learning and tiered indexing strategies.

<div class="project-sponsor">
<span class="project-sponsor-label">Sponsor:</span>
<a href="https://idea.rpi.edu/research/projects/rensselaer-ibm-artificial-intelligence-research-collaboration" class="project-sponsor-link" target="_blank">AIRC (Rensselaer-IBM Artificial Intelligence Research Collaboration)</a>
</div>
:::

::: {.project-card}
<div class="project-title">Explainable Risk and Coverage with Computable Insurance Contracts</div>

This project explores the development of computable insurance contracts that provide explainable risk assessment and coverage analysis, leveraging semantic technologies and knowledge graphs.

<div class="project-sponsor">
<span class="project-sponsor-label">Sponsor:</span>
<a href="https://iucrc.nsf.gov/centers/center-for-research-toward-advancing-financial-technologies-craft/" class="project-sponsor-link" target="_blank">CRAFT (Center for Research toward Advancing Financial Technologies)</a>
</div>
:::

::: {.project-card}
<div class="project-title">Privacy-Preserving Synthetic Data Generation for Financial Machine-Learning Tasks</div>

This project investigates methods for generating privacy-preserving synthetic financial data that can be used for machine learning tasks while maintaining data confidentiality and regulatory compliance.

<div class="project-sponsor">
<span class="project-sponsor-label">Sponsor:</span>
<a href="https://iucrc.nsf.gov/centers/center-for-research-toward-advancing-financial-technologies-craft/" class="project-sponsor-link" target="_blank">CRAFT (Center for Research toward Advancing Financial Technologies)</a>
</div>
:::

::: {.project-card}
<div class="project-title">Cascade-Adjusted Risk Analytics</div>

This project develops advanced risk analytics methodologies that incorporate cascade effects and interdependencies in financial systems, enabling more accurate risk assessment and management.

<div class="project-sponsor">
<span class="project-sponsor-label">Sponsor:</span>

</div>
